content:
A rendering of the new Target coming to downtown State College PERIOD

For students Target can be a onestop shop for basic college necessities PERIOD However having the closest retailer at  Colonnade Blvd  PERIOD poses a challenge for students without a car PERIOD

Fortunately for them Target has announced plans to open another retail store at the Fraser Centre for October   Real Estate Capital Management Developer Gary Brandeis said PERIOD

The new Target will be located at  S PERIOD Fraser St . which is off the corner of West Beaver Avenue and South Fraser St reet PERIOD The store will have two entrances and will occupy  square feet Targets spokeswoman Kristy Welker said PERIOD

The downtown Target will be geared more toward students Brandeis said PERIOD

I think having a Target in downtown State College will benefit both students and the community Brandeis said PERIOD With a location within walking distance Target can easily bring customers closer to their store. students will also have the option of shopping online on Targets website and picking up the ordered product at the location Brandeis said PERIOD

The downtown location also makes itself more appealing to students as it will offer customized furniture for smaller living spaces such as dorms and offcampus apartments Brandeis said PERIOD

Target takes their communitys needs into consideration and in college towns items such as storage bins and apartment decorations are in high demand Welker said PERIOD

Targets goal is to appeal to their customers in a way thats convenient to them Welker said PERIOD By adding a location within walking distance we can reach more customers. the new location will also feature Fan Central merchandise which will consist of products that are popular among college students namely sports team apparel Welker said PERIOD

Additionally this Target will offer a CVS pharmacy a Starbucks fresh produce and an electronics department Brandeis said PERIOD

Were finishing up the skeleton of the building and we should be able to start working on the interior of the store by early spring Brandeis said PERIOD

Over the past few weeks weve watched as new retailers have been announced as upcoming projects at the Fraser Centre and we are very excited to see that Target is one of them Communication Coordinator Courtney Hayden said PERIOD

The new Target should help the downtown economy thrive Hayden said PERIOD
